item.title: Graduate Research Student Toolkit
item.description: Graduate Research Life Preparing Your Research Proposal The Research Checklist Writing Project Management Project Updates Note-taking Referencing Statistics Coding Social Media Sport and Exercise Science Twitter List Other Useful Tools Time management Music & background noise for productivity Mindmapping Other useful reference sites for research students An unusually composed graduate student Graduate Research Life If you’ve stubled onto this page, chances are that you’ve recently embarked on your graduate research programme or are somewhere along in your research studies!
